fields.summary: iOS: Disappearing events in views/elements nested in ScrollViews

comments.body:
Adding event listeners has pointed out that we have far from parity with event sequence and triggering between Android and iOS. A cursory examination is at:
https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/pe/User+click-touch+event+handling
Pull pending means it's still in progress.

Closing bug. Verified fix on:

SDK build: 1.9.0.v20120121223134
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.8.201201210622
Xcode: 4.2
OS: Mac OS X Lion (10.7.2)
Device: iPhone 4S Verizon (5.0.1)

Cannot reproduce. 

Axway Appcelerator Studio, build: 5.1.4.201909061933Â 
macOS : 10.15
Node.js Version : 8.9.1
npm Version : 5.5.1
Appcelerator CLI : 7.1.1
Titanium CLI
CLI Version : 5.2.1
node-appc Version : 0.2.49
Titanium SDKs : 8.2.1.GA
